page.title: 08JUVENILE JAZZ BANDS
page.content: One of the most popular and rapidly growing hobbies for children in our area are Juvenile Jazz Bands.These are marching bands for children upto the age of 16.The instruments in the bands are Kazoo,Glockenspiel,Drums and Cymbals. The band is led by a Drum Majorette who carries a Mace,this is used to point direction as well as to perform throwing and twisting tricks with.The band has a banner with its name on,this usually has some link with the place the band comes from.All the bands have different uniforms.The bands enter competitions usually every weekend during the summer months.They are judged not only on their music but on various points of their marching. The best bands are awarded medals.The names of the nearest bands to us are, Eston Nab Crusaders and Wilton Royal Saphires.
